highlights: Developed an Agentic-AI Email Assistant using Jacâ€™s byLLM capabilities to enforce type-safe schema adherence in LLM outputs, replacing manual prompt engineering with semantic code definitions to ensure type safe output

Accelerated open-source adoption of Jac language by engineering client-facing applications and comprehensive technical documentation, lowering the barrier to entry for building novel agentic-first, graph-based systems

Architected multi-agent chat system with Model Context Protocol (MCP) infrastructure to streamline information retrieval across 5,000+ product documents, achieving 95% code accuracy and 85% user preference over previous solution.

Automated end-to-end ingestion pipelines for structured and unstructured data using AWS RDS and Neptune graph databases, enabling intelligent retrieval through dynamic model selection and graph traversal.

Established CI/CD pipeline with Docker, Jenkins, LlamaIndex, and PostgreSQL to maintain real-time data currency and validated system performance through automated code generation, compilation, and testing.

Developed automated assessment framework to evaluate system performance through end-to-end code generation, compilation, and runtime verification pipeline, focusing on correct usage of custom C API library to interface directly with proprietary hardware products.
Addressed the limitations of proprietary NVIDIA libraries by architecting a model-agnostic LLM pipeline, successfully synthesizing custom open-source CUDA kernels for high-performance computing

Achieved runtime performance within 20% of hand-optimized PyTorch kernels by engineering a recursive optimization loop that iteratively refines generated kernels to minimize inference latency and GPU memory overhead
Developed an API and GUI for a programmable relay-controlled resistor card to decrease time required for quality assurance testing by 66% through improving testing algorithm

Created demo embedded applications and documentation for customers learning to perform backplane resets, handle system level interrupts, and program simulations of synchro angles through low-level registers calls
Implemented method for users to easily retrieve pin mappings using React to simplify hardware configuration processes of trillions of combinations of motherboard-modules
